data.title: Scotland NT
data.meta_description:
From smooth and sweet, rich and spicy to smoke and peat, Whisky Row covers the many flavours of Scotch whisky.

It's history in a bottle.
data.text:
Whisky Row is the Official National Team Whisky, supporting the Scotland squad with our collection of three delicious drams, each with its own distinct character.

Bottled in limited numbers with a bespoke presentation box, perfect for football and whisky fans alike.

Following on from our previous, sought after bottlings of Rare Find Single Malt and Special Edition Blended Malts, the new Whisky Row releases are perfect for toasting your Hampden heroes!

Discover our trio of Whisky Row limited editions from Gleann Mòr Spirits Co, the Official Scottish National Team Whisky.

Only 350 individually numbered bottles of each winning style are available, kitted out in the three different Scottish National Team colours and housed in a beautifully designed 150th Anniversary presentation box.

Collect the full squad of Smooth & Sweet, Rich & Spicy and Smoke & Peat now, with the set including matching bottle numbers.

Introducing another Rare Find and continuing the run of official Scottish National Team whisky editions, the specially selected Blended Scotch Whisky celebrates the journey of the men’s first XI all the way to Germany.

A blend of Speyside Single Grain and Single Malt Whiskies which were all distilled in 1999, 25 years after Scotland last appeared in an international tournament in Germany, where they finished unbeaten in the group, including the most famous 0-0 in Scottish Football history.

Our cask strength, natural colour, non chill filtered whisky will be bottled when Scotland face Germany in the opening fixture on the 14th June 2024 in Munich, after maturing for 25 years in an Ex Oloroso Cask.

314 bottles will be released at 46.6% abv bottled from a single cask number 9181.

A marriage of flavourful Highland and Speyside Malt whiskies producing a classically sweet and fruity experience. This special edition Scotland National Team Whisky Row Smooth & Sweet is limited to 350 individually numbered bottles and packed in a 150th Anniversary presentation box. At 46% ABV, there is no chill filtration required and the colour is all natural from the casks.

Classically sweet and fruity. Honey on the nose, with delicate flavours of caramel, vanilla, baked apple, and soft spiced oak, giving way to a smooth, toasty finish.

This Whisky Row Rich and Spicy Scotland National Team special edition, housed in a 150th Anniversary presentation box, is blended using whiskies matured in ex-sherry casks creating a rich, characterful dram. Bottled at 46% ABV and limited to 350 individually numbered bottles, it is non chill filtered, and the colour is all natural from the casks.

Warm and welcoming, with heady aromas of dried fruit leading to fulsome notes of toffee, melted chocolate and sweet spice, giving way to a pleasing nutty, spiced oak finish.

Blended from a selection of the finest peated Single Malt Scotch Whisky from several distilleries across Scotland. Bottled at a pleasing 46% ABV, there is no chill filtration required and the colour is all natural from the casks. This Scotland National Team special edition is limited to 350 individually numbered bottles and presented in a 150th Anniversary presentation box.

Inviting aromas of sweet bonfire smoke, suggestions of peat and cream soda give way to tumbling waves of dried spice, cloves, aniseed and sea salt on the tongue and a warm finish with a hint of tea.

Gleann Mor Spirits is delighted to announce the latest addition to our officially licensed Whisky range for The Scottish National Team.

To celebrate the oldest rivalry in world football, we have hand-selected this cask, which will be bottled on the day of the 150th Anniversary Heritage Match between Scotland and England.

This Single Grain Scotch Whisky was distilled less than 3 miles, as the crow flies, from the venue of the original match, which was held at West of Scotland Cricket Club in Glasgow on the 30th of November 1872.

A 24-year-old single cask with an outturn of 257 individually numbered bottles.

The beautiful game deserves a beautiful dram, and this unbeatable blend is the perfect match for any fixture. Its winning mix of strength and style ensures it always stands out from the crowd. And it’s always a result worth celebrating!

Bottled by the team behind Whisky Row and first released in 2021, catch this great value Blended Scotch before it’s gone.

Aromas of Malt, oak, buttery vanilla fudge with a soft smokiness in the background. Creamed toffee, rich vanilla and pears to taste with a light spiced oak and hints of smoke to finish.
